Job Description: Technical Requirements:     Software Engineering Experience 1-4 years    Should have good knowledge in C , C# and OOPS concepts    Should have working knowledge on tools like Microsoft Visual Studio, TFS    Excellent technical communication skills (written and verbal)        Performs software design, implementation and verification activities.    Reviews specifications to determine software engineering requirements and design secure solutions to meet design inputs.    Estimates own work.    Completes the internal software quality process through the execution of design, implementation, unit and integration test activities for assigned software modules within a complex, distributed architecture.    Provide routine updates about technical findings and developments to technical lead
